cnbc.summary: The Berkshire Hathaway chairman asked students which of their peers they'd bet on. The lesson was to bet on yourself.

cnbc.title: Unexpected expenses take 10% of retirees' income, on average, research shows — many don't have enough cash on hand
cnbc.summary: The typical retiree household will spend an amount equivalent to 10% of annual income on unexpected expenses, and about 40% lack the cash to cover those costs.
